properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Remoting Developer Website

section.name: Welcome
section.p: The Remoting module is an optional AJF module who provides functionnalities to connect to remote resources. The module is based on the Handler interface to provide automatic implementation of user interfaces annotated correctly.
It provides implementation for the following strategies :

ul.li: Stored procedure mapping with the @StoredProcedure annotation
JAX-RS webservice with the XXX annotation
JAX-WS webservice with the XXX annotation
EJB remote with the XXX annotation

section.subsection:
The remoting extension is split into four parts :
ajf-remoting-api : Contain the public class, annotations and interfaces users of the ajf framework can use.
ajf-remoting-impl : Contain the implementation use by the framework. This where you will find the meat of how the remoting framework is working.
ajf-remoting-tests : Contain the integration tests for different scenarios
ajf-remoting-dist : Contain the distribution assembly.
